name: SA-MP Arm
author: matheusn.biolowons@gmail.com
description: SA-MP é um mod de jogo Massively Multiplayer Online gratuito para a versão para PC da Rockstar Games Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas (tm).

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl unzip lib32gcc1-x32-cross ca-certificates

cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o samp.tar.gz http://files.sa-mp.com/samp037svr_R2-1.tar.gz

mkdir -p /mnt/server
tar -xzvf samp.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/
cp -r /mnt/server/samp03/* /mnt/server
rm -rf /mnt/server/samp03/
cd /mnt/server
sed -i '3d' /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "rcon_password changemeplease" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "Note" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "Notas" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg

chown -R root:root /mnt

export HOME=/mnt/server

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: The maximum amount of players your server can hold. By changing this number you can alter how many players can enter the server.

variables.name: Max NPC
variables.description: The maximum amount of NPCs your server can hold. By changing this number you can alter how many of the player slots can be used by NPCs.

variables.name: Web URL
variables.description: The website people can visit to gain more information about the server.

variables.name: Announce
variables.description: Toggles if the server should be announced to SA-MP masterlist.

variables.name: Query
variables.description: Toggles if the server information should be displayed in the server browser. Players can still join a server that has disabled querying, but the server browser will not display any information.

variables.name: Rcon Password
variables.description: The password used to administrate the server and use the remote console (rcon). You must make sure to change this to something hard to crack so that others cannot take control of your server. Your server will NOT start if changeme is the RCON password!
